headline: Okra and Tomatoes
name: Okra and Tomatoes
description: Okra and tomatoes are sautéed with onion, green pepper, and celery in this easy recipe; garnish with crumbled bacon for a tasty side dish.
recipeIngredient: 1 pound frozen okra, thawed and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium-high heat until evenly browned and crisp. Drain; crumble bacon onto a plate and set aside.
Add okra, onion, pepper, and celery to the pan; sauté until tender. Add tomatoes, salt, and pepper; cook and stir until tomatoes are heated through.
